name: Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Amazing Aria
description:
'Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ Amazing Aria' (stylization of うたの☆プリンスさまっ♪ Amazing Aria) is a rhythmic otome video game made for the PlayStation Portable on December 23rd, 2010. It is the second entry to be made for the main series, which in turn reintroduced the dateable characters from Class A (including Cecil Aijima and a secret character), songs, CGs (illustrated scenes), as well as the ability to carry on special data from Uta no Prince-sama Repeat via local communication. It received a combined special edition with 'Sweet Serenade' (third entry) for both the PS Vita and Nintendo Switch.

*Nanami Haruka has found her partner and the voice to bring her compositions to life. Yet challenges just don't stop there. To pass the exams, she has to win the graduation auditions with her partner. When emotions get into music, they may make the melody sweeter, but couple fights could stump your work in progress. Learn to deal with the princes as a girlfriend and combine all aspects of romance into your songs.

(*Source of Description - Uta no Prince-sama Wiki; 'Uta no☆Prince-sama♪ -Amazing Aria-')
